title: Did a Muslim Man Rape a 13-Year-Old Girl and Get Beaten by Trump Supporters?
subtitle: A fake news web site stole an image from a 2013 incident in Egypt, then used it to claim that it showed a Muslim man who had raped a girl in Ohio.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: An American Muslim man raped a 13-year-old girl in Ohio, and then was beaten by Trump supporters.
